TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 544
TEI.2.document_title: Asa Mitchell to Stephen F Austin, 11-27-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Asa Mitchell, November 27, 1830. Bill and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 544

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Asa Mitchell, November 27, 1830. Bill and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To *p*Asa Mitchel*/p* Dr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1824">1824 */date_mentioned* To 3 pr. Cotton cards a 5-------------------- 15.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1825">1825 */date_mentioned* To 6 Bushels corn furnished *person_mentioned*Militia */person_mentioned*under *person_mentioned*R. Jones */person_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*indian */person_mentioned*expedition---------------------— 6.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826*/date_mentioned* 3 bushels Salt @ 4---------------------12.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827*/date_mentioned* 1 Set Shaving utensils----------------------------- 8.00*/p*
*p*2 bushels Salt pr order*person_mentioned* J. Austin*/person_mentioned*-------8.00*/p*
*p*3 bottles spirits for oyster trip-------------------------------------- 2.00*/p*
*p*aid in Surveying--------------------- 6. 40*/p*
*p*57.40*/p* *p*Trade rates deduct 1/3------------------ 19.13*/p*
*p*Cash—---- $38.26 2/3 38.26 2/3*/p*
*p*order*person_mentioned* H. Chrisman*/person_mentioned* ----------- 3.00*/p*
*p*Due bill-------- 2.00*/p*
*p*Due bill--------------20.00*/p*
*p*trade------------------- 25.00*/p*
*p*deduct 1/3 -------------8.33 1/3*/p*
*p*cash--------------16.66 2/3 16.66 2/3*/p*
*p*$54. 93 1/3*/p* *p*Received payment of the above account in full *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-27-1830">27 Novr. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Asa Mitchell*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
